channel.title: Project NoobScape V1 - Now Hiring! Places going fast! [link approved]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z136/toonshorty/mainbanner2.gif[/img] [size=17pt]== Project NoobScape ==[/size] owner = Toonshorty co-owner = goddess [size=13pt]Link approved by Mod Taharok [/size] Join at [url=http://www.projectnoobscape.smfforfree3.com]www.projectnoobscape.smfforfree3.com[/url] Once you join you will be sent the hamatchi network name and password and server IP /*main worlds*/ projectnoobscape.no-ip.org projectnoobscape.servegame.com /*secondary worlds*/ projectnoobscape2.no-ip.org Want a job... post the following...
Name: Job: Why should you have that job: Experience:
Now hiring places for... [size=11pt]Suspended requests/Awaiting approval[/size] - - - - - - [size=11pt]Admins (FULL)[/size] killar456 schuyler Zandar [size=11pt]Mods[/size] chado newyorkowns Doggiedoo86 wasabiie - [size=11pt]Web Client[/size] - - - [size=11pt]Testers[/size] LINescapeowns - - [size=11pt]Coders (FULL)[/size] toonshorty J6612 Wales 00 Zozuma Jarod [size=11pt]Idea creators[/size] (think up ideas for the server and pass them on to the coders - ideas must be approved by me) Zandar Jord Knuckels - - [size=11pt]Hoster (FULL)[/size] newyorkowns ________________________________________________________________________________ [size=15pt]About the server[/size] source: fr33sc4p3 owner: toonshorty ~~ Pictures ~~ Cool Starting Place [img]http://img385.imageshack.us/img385/9181/projnoobscape1kc5.jpg[/img] Cool shops (more to come) [img]http://img385.imageshack.us/img385/33/projnoobscape2yb6.jpg[/img] Cool Unique PKBox and acient magicz! [img]http://img400.imageshack.us/img400/7727/projnoobscape3mu3.jpg[/img] thanks, - toonshorty [br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 02:38:11 PM[/size][hr]anyone wanne be part of it... Remember it's not finished yet I NEED IDEAS! - toonshorty[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 03:08:19 PM[/size][hr]No one wanna join???

Job:mod or admin

Experience:Admin on a few server,Ran a server called defsworld for a few months(hoping to get rehosted), I have coded my own server and can help you.

I also know you fairly well as you probably know me
I have some of your tuts on my forum and we both do sleepdev.

item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

tchandle:

Hey you could make me mod I’m mod in runescape. Extra friendly! Gave someone 500k that I earned myself! :eek: Hope yoou choose to make me mod!

Mod in RuneScape? How come I don’t believe you…

Toon, little advice. Don’t allow people to apply for admin/mod as most of them that apply are corrupt and power hungry. If I were you, I’d only allow those that you know you can trust, such as close friends, be admin/mod.

Anyways, good luck on this.

Read full topic
